title: Almost a Cat-astrophic Love Story - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Animal Characteristics   Childish Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Power Couple   Rivalry   Showbiz   Tsundere
author: Demonic Fire   妖妖若火
description: The person that Pei Zhen hates most in his life is the perfect Fu Sichen. Alas, life is full of surprises and unpredictability. One fine day, an accident turns Pei Zhen into Fu Sichen's pet cat! As Fu Sichen's pet cat, he makes a shocking discovery about his sworn enemy - a deep dark secret that the perfect Fu Sichen has kept hidden for years. Trapped in his cat body, Pei Zhen moves from one adventure into another while trying hard to find a way of turning back into his human self. When he finally does, the world as he once knew, has become a completely different place!>
